task.summary: Base Controller Added Other Operations Show Store Delete
added data key in delete function base repository
Generate Module from command "adonis module name model"
Delete Module command-ACE -> adonis module name model --rollback
Added Mongoose Database support for CRUD operations
Added option to change collection name. Updated ReadMe
Fixed Base Repository Typo for User Repo
Fixed Base Repository Typo for User Repo
Added Update and Delete functions in no sql model

- Changed SQL Operations / NoSql_Operations return statement to Model Directly instead response.json() - FIX: In model, table name was changed to lowercase and snake_case - In database config, changed Mongo_ prefix to DB_ - Put #model in Repository constructor - Modified base functions (store) for request param, Now it will accept plain object as well as request object - Added base Validator and extend all validator with parent. - Modified new validators and only contain rules object that will override parent rule object.
Added alias in app.js for myHelper
Changed the model access modifier in repository

- Fixed User Controller: Removed Try catch from user Controller - Fixed Response Message Structure - Fixed Validator message structure - Updated env.example for email and other stuff - Added JWT Middleware for API requests

MESSAGE.value: Delete Module command-ACE -> adonis module name model --rollback
Added Mongoose Database support for CRUD operations
Added option to change collection name. Updated ReadMe
Fixed Base Repository Typo for User Repo
Added Update and Delete functions in no sql model

- Changed SQL Operations / NoSql_Operations return statement to Model Directly instead response.json() - FIX: In model, table name was changed to lowercase and snake_case - In database config, changed Mongo_ prefix to DB_ - Put #model in Repository constructor - Modified base functions (store) for request param, Now it will accept plain object as well as request object - Added base Validator and extend all validator with parent. - Modified new validators and only contain rules object that will override parent rule object.
Added alias in app.js for myHelper
Changed the model access modifier in repository

- Fixed User Controller: Removed Try catch from user Controller - Fixed Response Message Structure - Fixed Validator message structure - Updated env.example for email and other stuff - Added JWT Middleware for API requests
